name: army jeep driving 4x4 parking
description:
Army jeep driving 4x4 parking is a real parking game for military soldiers. It’s main focus is to drive and park truck or jeep and drive through the base. The vehicles used in the game are military buses, Humvee, tanks, helicopters, tanks, jets, warhead trucks and army jeep. 
For instance you suppose that you are driver and you are going to drive military jeep in this additive environment. Discover different off-road missions in this simulation game. The vets are on army truck or jeep and you have to control it till it is parked in the parking garage. Make the mission successful by taking the military soldiers to the bunkers. 
You can use steering wheel, tilt and arrow controls to become army driver. It doesn’t only offer 3D 4x4 transport; it also does offer a whole new driving sensation. Serve your country; are you ready for this mission? You are part of the battle to drive and manage the transport and vehicles to help soldiers in combat, combat support and combat service. 
Enjoy many 3D levels; be creative while taking the soldiers on parking mission. 
Tips and Tricks
- Use reverse gear in case you are struck in a hurdle to save time
- If you are not easy with the steering control, go to settings in main menu and select tilt or arrow control for better driving. 

Main Features:
• Outstanding 4x4 jeep simulation
• Several different parking missions
• Powerful brakes
• Army Environment
• Impressive driving sound effects
• Configurable settings
• Get more stars for quickly getting to Military objectives.
